evidence.source_document: Order Approving Settlements of Minors’ Claims
evidence.text: The Court approves the Settlements of the claims of minor Plaintiffs B.M., B.G., L.A., and G.A. in this Lawsuit.

evidence.source_document: Joint Notice of Conditional Settlement and Stipulation to Stay Litigation Deadlines
evidence.text: Plaintiffs and Defendant ("Parties"), by and through undersigned counsel, hereby notify the Court that the Parties have reached conditional settlements in this action under the Federal Tort Claims Act, 28 U.S.C. § 2671, et seq. The Parties stipulate and request that all deadlines in the Court’s Order dated December 14, 2023 (ECF No. 439) be vacated and the action be stayed based on the following:
